airframe.name: MavPTO with tiny 2_1_1

let.var: test;\ static int16_t last_pan_command = 0;\ last_pan_command += LIMIT(values[COMMAND_PAN]-last_pan_command,-MAX_PAN_RATE,MAX_PAN_RATE);\ int test2
test3;\ static int16_t last_tilt_command = -6000;\ last_tilt_command += LIMIT(values[COMMAND_TILT]-last_tilt_command,-MAX_TILT_RATE,MAX_TILT_RATE);\ int test4

airframe.makefile:
CONFIG = \"tiny_2_1_1.h\"
include $(PAPARAZZI_SRC)/conf/autopilot/tiny.makefile
FLASH_MODE=IAP
fbw.CFLAGS += -DFBW -DBOARD_CONFIG=$(CONFIG) -DLED -DTIME_LED=1 fbw.srcs = sys_time.c $(SRC_ARCH)/sys_time_hw.c $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c main_fbw.c main.c
fbw.srcs += commands.c
#tiny sense fbw.CFLAGS += -DACTUATORS=\"servos_4017_hw.h\" -DSERVOS_4017 fbw.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/servos_4017_hw.c actuators.c
fbw.CFLAGS += -DRADIO_CONTROL -DRADIO_CONTROL_TYPE=RC_FUTABA fbw.srcs += radio_control.c $(SRC_ARCH)/ppm_hw.c
fbw.CFLAGS += -DINTER_MCU -DUART0_BAUD=B38400 -DMCU_USART_LINK fbw.srcs += inter_mcu.c fbw.srcs += link_mcu_usart.c $(SRC_ARCH)/uart_hw.c fbw.CFLAGS += -DGPS -DUBX -DUSE_UART0 -DGPS_LINK=Uart0 fbw.srcs += gps_ubx.c
fbw.CFLAGS += -DADC -DUSE_AD0 fbw.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/adc_hw.c
